column5: Our MSc Business Analytics programme is offered by the College of Business & Law. It provides students with a portfolio of business and analytical methods for solving problems and supporting decision-making.This programme will provide you with a specialism in business analytics as well as an extensive knowledge of business and information systems.At the core of this programme is a selection of topics covering cloud technologies, business intelligence and business analytics, IT performance management, data management and IT project management. A research project allows you to explore and develop an IT solution to a specific business problem in an area specific to the Business Information and Analytics area.
